title: Bug 121687: Exception thrown when exporting data in a table inside a grid cell
description: Exception is thrown when trying to export data in a table that is inside a grid cell.
OB: When trying to export data in a table that is inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown.
EB: The data in the table inside the grid cell should be successfully exported without any exceptions.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a grid.
2. Insert a table inside one of the grid cells.
3. Insert another table inside another grid cell.
